Name: Behavior of the urban traffic of the city of Sao Paulo in Brazil
Abstract: The database was created with records of behavior of the urban traffic of the city of Sao Paulo in Brazil.
RelevantInfo: The database was created with records of behavior of the urban traffic of the city of Sao Paulo in Brazil from December 14, 2009 to December 18, 2009 (From Monday to Friday). Registered from 7:00 to 20:00 every 30 minutes. The data set Behavior of the urban traffic of the city of Sao Paulo in Brazil was used in academic research at the Universidade Nove de Julho - Postgraduate Program in Informatics and Knowledge Management.
Source:
Creators original owner and donors: Ricardo Pinto Ferreira (1), Andrea Martiniano (2) and Renato Jose Sassi (3).
